casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
C'Quwan JOHNSON No. 411P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Kirby H. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Johnson, C'Quwan Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th of December 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
